trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem"></xref> event.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs> is constructed and passed to the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event when you call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> or <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> methods on a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control in virtual mode.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs"></xref> class.
A value indicating whether the search is a text search.
A value indicating whether the search is a prefix search.
A value indicating whether to include subitems of list items in the search.
The text of the item to search for.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> at which to start the search.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> at which to start the search.
Gets the direction from the current item that the search should take place.

Identifying the nearest item in a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control can vary depending on the operating system the application is running on; therefore, the search direction is a hint, and not an absolute guarantee of results.
One of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.SearchDirectionHint"></xref> values.
Gets a value indicating whether the search should include subitems of list items.
Subitems are typically used when a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> is in <xref:System.Windows.Forms.View.Details> view.
`true` if subitems should be included in the search; otherwise, `false`.
Gets or sets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> .

Set the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Index%2A> property to the index of the item matching the search criteria when handling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.SearchForVirtualItem> event.
The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> found in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref>.
Gets a value indicating whether the search should return an item if its text starts with the search text.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.Text%2A> property can specify a substring of the desired text.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.SearchForVirtualItemEventArgs.IsPrefixSearch%2A> property indicates whether the search should match items that start with the search text.
`true` if the search should match item text that starts with the search text; otherwise, `false`.
Gets a value indicating whether the search is a text search.

You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
`true` if the search is a text search; `false` if the search is a location search.
Gets the index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> where the search starts.
This property is used for a location search.
The index of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListViewItem"></xref> indicating where the search starts
Gets the starting location of the search.

You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
The <xref href="System.Drawing.Point"></xref> that indicates the starting location of the search.
Gets the text used to find an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.

You can search a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView> control by location by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindNearestItem%2A> method, or you can perform a text search by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.ListView.FindItemWithText%2A> method.
The text used to find an item in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.ListView"></xref> control.
